H0.text: Which virus spread by fleas was deliberately introduced into Australia to control rabbits in 1951. Myxoma

H1.text: Which virus spread by fleas was deliberately introduced into Australia to control rabbits in 1951. Shope Fibroma

H2.text: Which virus spread by fleas was deliberately introduced into Australia to control rabbits in 1951. Rabbit Hemorrhagic Disease

H3.text: Which virus spread by fleas was deliberately introduced into Australia to control rabbits in 1951. Mixy

A4.text: Myxoma virus is passively transmitted on the mouth parts of mosquitoes, (.same as Aedes aegyptii) or fleas, and presumably other biting arthropods

A5.text: Myxoma virus is a poxvirus in the genus Leporipoxvirus
